description:
Evan Solo ...
You've seen Evan -- another Kaden discovery -- in hardcore action in other DVDs, but this was his first solo for us. Here's what Kaden had to say himself about Evan:

'Hey Guys! Let me tell you about this gorgeous young man I found at the shooting range. His name is Evan and he enjoys firing off rounds at the range. He is about 5'9 and weighs in at a perfect 145 lbs. He has a face that will melt your heart. I almost drowned in his sparkling blue pools that he calls eyes! Quick give me CPR! This young man is way too much for me to handle. His solo was so hot! You could tell he was nervous, but that made it even sexier. He did not seem to mind playing with his ass, however there were a few times that I wanted to be like Dink and say, 'Arch that back bitch!' We are just getting started on Evan, by the time I am finished with him, he will be going from, 'Never to whenever!' Stick around and give this gorgeous guy support as he takes his time to experience something new and show off his body and jerks his yummy dick to some porn.' -- Kaden
title: Evan
